00017 /* 0C 1D 12 E0 1F 10*/
00018 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00019 #define EMAC_ADDR0              0x10
00020 #define EMAC_ADDR1              0x1F
00021 #define EMAC_ADDR2              0xE0
00022 #define EMAC_ADDR3              0x12
00023 #define EMAC_ADDR4              0x1D

00025 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768)
00026 #define EMAC_ADDR0              0x00
00027 #define EMAC_ADDR1              0xFF
00028 #define EMAC_ADDR2              0xFF
00029 #define EMAC_ADDR3              0xFF
00030 #define EMAC_ADDR4              0xFF
00031 #define EMAC_ADDR5              0xFF
00032 #endif
